original_title: Ajari Aku Cara Mencintai Makhluk-Makhluk di Luar Kamarku
overview: Alma, a beautiful girl who didn’t get the chance to hear how chaos the world is since she was born. Her mother then bought a hearing device for Alma hoping she would love the idea of sound. She got it wrong. It wasn’t just that she couldn’t hear, she wasn’t being heard. By a poetry in her room, she asks her shadows about love she has to the universe.
tagline: The struggle to hear and to be heared.
title: Teach Me How to Love The Creatures Outside of My Room
